data.title: 101 Boy Names That Mean Smart, Intelligent and Wise
data.meta_description: These smart boy names represent wisdom and intelligence. Pick a name that means smart for your brilliant baby boy!
data.text:
These smart boy names represent wisdom and intelligence. Pick a name that means smart for your brilliant baby boy!

Everyone wants their children to be bright, so why not inspire your son to shoot for the stars by giving him a name that motivates a love of learning?

When choosing one of these sharp titles for your little one, first explore meanings that represent intelligence. Baby boy names that translate to educated knowledgeable, bright, and brilliant are all smart.

When choosing a boy name that means smart, it’s important to remember that smarts are not always associated with books and academics. Intelligence is a person’s ability to gain knowledge and skills and then apply that information to different scenarios.

Related: 75 Strong Boy Names for Babies

Harvard University professor and psychologist Howard Gardner created the Theory of Multiple Intelligences. People have multiple forms of intelligence, including spatial, bodily-kinesthetic, musical, naturalistic, interpersonal, and intrapersonal intelligences.

Get creative with your name ideas and think about the inspirational figures in your life as well. No matter which baby boy name you choose, your child will be sure to be brilliant!

Here are over 100 unique boy names that mean smart to choose from.

Boy Names That Mean Smart or Brilliant

Aadij - This Indian name means “born of mind."

Aakil - Of Arabic origins, this name means “intelligent."

Aatos - A Finnish name meaning “thought” or “idea."

Abah - This is a Biblical name that means “father” and “one who is intelligent."

Aio - A unisex Italian name meaning “teacher” or “tutor."

Armend - An Albanian name meaning “golden mind."

Aydin - Of Turkish origins, this epithet means “enlightened” or “bright."

Baskala - An Indian name meaning “teacher”, “learned”, or “wise."

Beowolf - This is an Anglo name meaning “intelligent wolf."

Berdy - Of German origins, this name means “very intelligent."

Bertrand - A German title meaning “bright."

Bodhish - Of Sanskrit origins, this name means “the intelligent person” or “enlightenment."

Boman - This is a Persian name meaning “great mind."

Camar - Of African origins, this name means “he who is a teacher."

Charvik - A Sanskrit name that means “intelligent."

Chiki - This is a Hindu name that translates to “intelligent” or “sweet."

Cong-Min - Of Chinese origins, this title means “intelligent."

Cuthbert - This Old English name means “well-known”, “bright”, or “famous."

Dheemant - A Hindi name meaning “smart” or “intelligent."

Diago - Of Spanish origins, this name means “teacher."

Euclid - This name has Greek origins and means “intelligent."

Faheem - An Arabic name meaning “intelligent”, “understanding”, “perceptive”, or “judicious."

Feivel - Of Hebrew and Yiddish origins, this epithet means “bright one” or “brilliant one."

Hubert - This is a German name that means “shining spirit” or “bright intellect."

Hugh - A German name that means “bright soul”, “mind”, and “intellect."

Hugo - This German title means “bright soul” or “mind."

Keen - This is an English name meaning “sharp” or “bold."

Lambert - A Latin title meaning “wealthy in land” or “brilliant."

Manish - This is a Hindu name meaning “intellect” or “God of the mind."

Osbert - Of Old English origins, this name means “inspired” or “divine."

Raghnall - This name means “powerful judgment” and has Irish origins.

Sabio - A Spanish and Portuguese name that translates to “clever” or “learned."

Saggio - Of Italian origins, this name means “sharp” or “perceptive."

Sago - This Spanish name means “clever."

Savant - A French name meaning “learned."

Sirak - This is a Marathi name that means “one who has great intellect."

Suman - A gender-neutral Sanskrit name that means “intelligent” or “wise."

Ugo - Of Italian origins, this title translates to “bright in mind and spirit."

Urval - This Hindu title means “impressive” or “intelligent."

Yinesh - Of Hindu origins, this name means “intelligent."

Zeki - A Turkish name meaning “smart."

Boy Names That Mean Wise & Wisdom

Aariv - A Hindi name meaning “king of wisdom."

Alden - This Old English name means “wise protector."

Aldo - Of Old English origins, this title means “old and wise."

Alfie - Another Old English name meaning “wise counsel."

Alfred - This Old English name means “wise counsel."

Alvis - An Old Norse name meaning “all wise."

Athos - This is the male version of the name Athena, the goddess of wisdom in Greek mythology. This old title translates to “Zeus."

Basir - Of Arabic origins, this name also means “wise."

Bilge - This is a gender-neutral name that has Turkish origins and means “wise."

Conrad - Of Old German origins, this title means “brave counsel” and “old advisor."

Conroy - An Old German name meaning “brave counsel."

Eldridge - This Old English name means “old counsel."

Elvis - An Old Norse name meaning “all wise” and a Scandinavian name meaning “wise” or “sage."

Favian - Of Latin origins, this title means “man of wisdom."

Frode - An Old Norse name meaning “learned” or “wise."

Frodi - This name has Danish, Norse, and Scandinavian origins and means “wise” or “learned."

Gorn - Of English origins, this name means both “warrior” and “the one with wisdom and intelligence."

Gyan - A Hebrew name meaning “the Lord is gracious” and a Hindi and Sanskrit name meaning “wisdom”, “knowledge”, and “enlightenment."

Hakim - Of Arabic origins, this is another name that means “wise."

Kendry - A Malagasy name that means “wise man."

Mimir - Of Scandinavian origins, this name means “the wise one."

Mudar - This Muslim name means “name of a great grandfather of the prophet."

Nakos - A Native American name meaning “sage” or “wise."

Nzeru - Of Malawian origins, this title translates to “wisdom."

Quinn - A Gaelic, Celtic, and Irish title that means “wise” or “descendant of Conn."

Rainer - This is a Norse name meaning “a wise ruler” or “wise army."

Ray - A German name meaning “wise protection." This is the shortened version of Raymond.

Redmond - Of German origins, this title means “advisor."

Reginald - This Old English name means “powerful one”, “mighty counselor”, and “ruler’s advisor."

Ronald - Of Old Norse origins, this title means “mighty” or “ruler’s counselor."

Sage - A unisex name meaning “wise one” that has French, Latin, and English origins.

Seanan - This is an Irish name that means “old” and "wise."

Senan - Of French origins, this name also means “old” and “wise."

Shannon - This gender-neutral title has Irish origins meaning “wise one."

Solon - A Greek name meaning “the wise one." This is a great option to pair with the girl name Sonia, which means “wisdom."

Vivek - This Hindi name means “discerning with wisdom."

Wisdom - An English name meaning “wisdom” or “common sense."

Boy Names That Mean Knowledge

Adhit - An Indian name meaning “bestowed with knowledge”, “intelligent”, and “wise."

Agama - Of Sanskrit origins, this title means “knowledge” or “wisdom."

Aleem - This Hindi name means “knowledgeable."

Aqeel - An Arabic name meaning “knowledgeable”, “intelligent”, or “wise."

Baskar - This Hindu name means “very knowledgeable and skilled person” as well as “sun."

Bodhin - Of Indian origins, this epithet means “one who possesses supreme knowledge and enlightenment."

Cato - A Latin name meaning “all-knowing” and an American name meaning “good judgment."

Danish - Of Persian origins, this name means “knowledge”, “wisdom”, or “science."

Giansh - An Indian name that means “full of knowledge."

Hekima - This is an African name meaning “knowledgeable” and “clever."

Katran - Of Indian origins, this name means “well-learned” or “knowledgeable."

Kisho - A Japanese name that means “one who knows his own mind."

Oha - This Hindu title means “true knowledge."

Tide - A unisex Biblical name means “the knowledge of elevation."

Talib - This is an Arabic name meaning “seeker of knowledge."

Ved - A Sanskrit name meaning “sacred knowledge."

Veda - A Hindi name that means “knowledge” or “wisdom."

Zabir - This is an Arabic name that means “one who has a vast knowledge of religion."

Names Inspired By Wise Figures

Albert - A German name that means “intelligent”, “noble”, “bright”, and “famous." This is an extremely fitting title for one of the most significant physicists of all time, Albert Einstein!

Buddha - Of Buddhist origins, this name means “wise one." This was the nickname of Siddhartha Gautama, the founder of Buddhism.

Ethan - This is a Latin name meaning “constant." It is also the title of Ethan the Ezrahite, one of the wisest figures in the Bible.

Mahatma - Another Indian change-maker, Mahatma Gandhi is the name of an inspirational lawyer who helped free his country from British colonial rule and promoted non-violent cooperation. This Sanskrit name means “great soul."

Nelson - An Old English name meaning “son of a champion." This is the name of a champion of human rights and the man who ended the apartheid in South Africa — Nelson Mandela.

Stephen - One of the great minds of this century, Stephen Hawking made groundbreaking discoveries in the field of physics. This is a Greek name that means “crown."

Socrates - This famous Greek title means “philosophical” and “brilliant." It is the name of one of the most well-known philosophers in history.

Solomon - A name that means “peaceful” in Hebrew. This was the title of a king of Israel who was known for his wisdom.

Male names that mean intelligent are a great choice for your little genius, no matter what field he chooses to pursue!
